attributes.action: Pads should be free for all the girls  for periods
attributes.additional_details:
There’s many girls that study and work hard to earn money, however half of the money a year is used for pads and tampons; so the government should help us.

Sign this petition if you agree
attributes.background: Girls should get free pads for periods because it’s really hard for most people to afford. Periods is a natural thing that happens to all the girls and no one chose this to happen to us. So we should get pads for free.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Fund free female sanitary products, such as sanitary towels and tampons
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555551
